page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: There are few facilities for sporting activities in the 3 villages. Broadmayne has a football field & tennis court.Skittles,darts & pool are played in local public houses.Regular classes are available in painting, floral art & keep fit.However the area is well-served & many residents enjoy the following activities:rugby,cricket swimming,fishing,sailing,walking, riding,golf,running,dancing & ice- skating.At home;Do-it-Yourself, watching T.V.,reading,sewing,knitting Cards & Scrabble are popular hobbies. Gardening is very popular.Some keep bees & chickens.A horticultural society is held in the next village. Dorchester,4 miles away has a library service including tapes & jigsaws. Badminton,chess,photography & amateur dramatics are amongst the many clubs.
